summary: A professional baduk player infiltrates his local underground gambling scene to avenge his brother's death.
cast: Kil-kang Ahn|Sung-Ki Ahn|Greg Chun|Marc Diraison|Dorothy Elias-Fahn|Todd Haberkorn|Choi Jin-Hyuk|Hae-Kyun Jung|Woo-sung Jung|In-kwon Kim|William Frederick Knight|Beom-su Lee|Ben Lepley|Erica Lindbeck|Dave Mallow|Joe Ochman|Ben Pronsky|Lee Si-young|Keith Silverstein|Doug Stone|Kaiji Tang|Joe Thomas|Kirk Thornton
title: Sin-ui hansu
